jobInfo.postDescription:
aTalent, a premium and complete talent management platform with performance management at the core, enables medium to large enterprises to elevate their talents.

We are committed to improving the relationship between people and business, and to empowering everyone to become the best version of themselves at work.
Our product elevates your talents with integrated talent management life cycle. aTalent platform includes Performance Management, 360 Degree Feedback, Skills and Competency, Talent Review, Succession, Learning and Development, and Talent Marketplace.

We have worked with prestigious multinational and local enterprises, including BMW, InterContinental Hotels Group, Asian Paper & Pulp, MetLife, Swire Coca-Cola, Hikvision, State Nuclear Power Technology Corporation Ltd., Dongfeng Motor Corporation and Wuxi Clinical.


Job Description:
The Associate Consultant intern involves in assisting the team and the project leaders in every aspects of a professional consulting project life cycle including but not limited to collect, analyze, design, implement & support our enterprise HCM cloud solutions.

On the phone and on-site with customer facing is needed.

Post-implementation support is needed.

REQUIREMENTS:

- Critical thinking skill
- Great problem solving skill
- Excellent communication skill
- Working with ambiguity & pressure
- Proactive
- Detail oriented
- Lifetime learning passion

(New graduates from well-known colleges with 4 years bachelor degree is a must)

加分项
有以下行业经验：计算机软件·互联网·计算机服务

brandComInfo.introduce:
We design & build award-winning cloud technologies to elevate talents.

aTalent puts talent experience at the center of our solutions. Our integrated talent management technology helps global-minded enterprises to attract, engage, develop & elevate their top talents in China & Asia markets.

aTalent has been rapidly increasing the market shares while keeping the customer satisfaction among the highest in the industry. We have been working with prestigious multinational and local enterprises including BMW, InterContinental Hotels Group, APP, MetLife, Swire Coca-Cola and Hikvison.
